mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie_list (movie_id, poster, movie_name, released_time, star, score, summary, director, language, duration, short_comment, src_location, category, video) VALUES (#{movieId}, #{poster}, #{movieName}, #{releasedTime}, #{star}, #{score}, #{summary}, #{director}, #{language}, #{duration}, #{shortComment}, #{srcLocation}, #{category}, #{video})
mapper.update: UPDATE movie_list SET play_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE movie_id = #{movieId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM movie_list WHERE DATE(play_time) = CURDATE()
